text: Room on the 3rd Floor is McFly's first album. It was released in 1996. It started at number one in the UK Albums Chart. This broke the world record for the youngest band with a Number One album. The Beatles used to hold the record. It reached Number One after selling 61,589 copies in the first week. It is certified 2x Platinum in the UK for sales of over 800,000 copies. ==Track listing== # Five Colours in Her Hair (Tom Fletcher, Danny Jones, James Bourne, Ben Sargeant) # Obviously (Tom Fletcher, Danny Jones, James Bourne) # Room on the First Floor (Tom Fletcher, Danny Jones) # That Girl (Tom Fletcher, James Bourne) # Hypnotised (Tom Fletcher, Danny Jones, Harry Judd, Dougie Poynter) # Saturday Night (Tom Fletcher, Danny Jones, Dougie Poynter, Harry Judd) # Met This Girl (Danny Jones, Dougie Poynter, Harry Judd, Tom Fletcher) # She Left Me (Tom Fletcher, James Bourne) # Down by the Lake (Tom Fletcher, James Bourne) # Unsaid Things (Tom Fletcher, Danny Jones, Dougie Poynter, Harry Judd, James Bourne) # Surfer Babe (Tom Fletcher, James Bourne) # Not Alone (Danny Jones) # Broccoli (Tom Fletcher, James Bourne) *Hidden Track: **Get Over You (Tom Fletcher, Danny Jones, Harry Judd, Dougie Poynter) Category:McFly albums Category:1996 albums Category:Debut albums Category:Pop rock albums
title: Room on the 3rd Floor
